name: Miko Gakkou: Second Year
description: Summer's here! In a world where humans and youkai coexist, three young shrine maidens, Kaede, Sanae and Yuu, continue their adventures fighting against mischievous youkai in their sophomore year in this fully voiced action rhythm game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP3 Processor: 1GHz or faster 32-bit or 64-bit processor Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9 graphics device DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 256 MB available space Sound Card: Required. Headphones recommended.

reviews.review_text: This game is interesting; a bullet hell rythem game. Easy mode is to easy, Normal is just right, hard mode is not that hard if you have fast reactions. Only down side is the fact the 100% only unlocks a stupid hatsune miku song; thats it. Too much effort for a song i can just look up on the internet.
